fterm.column_description: For US publications only, the description in HTML, limited to the first 9 megabytes

application_number_formatted.column_description: Application number, formatted to the patent office format where possible.

application_number.column_description: Patent application number (DOCDB compatible), eg: 'US-87124404-A'. This may not always be set.

grant_date.column_description: For US publications only, the claims in plain text

cpc.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

publication_date.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

kind_code.column_description: Kind code, indicating application, grant, search report, correction, etc. These are different for each country.

pct_number.column_description: PCT number for this application if it was part of a PCT filing, eg: 'PCT/EP2008/062623'.

description_localized.column_description: The publication abstracts in different languages

citation.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

inventor_harmonized.column_description: For US publications only, the claims in HTML

claims_localized.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

application_kind.column_description: High-level kind of the application: A=patent; U=utility; P=provision; W= PCT; F=design; T=translation.

priority_claim.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

assignee_harmonized.column_description: Two-letter language code for this text

title_localized.column_description: The publication titles in different languages

art_unit.column_description: The grant date, or 0 if not granted.

family_id.column_description: Family ID (simple family). Grouping on family ID will return all publications associated with a simple patent family (all publications share the same priority claims).

uspc.column_description: For US publications only, the description in plain text, limited to the first 9 megabytes
